title: paripAlanai puri
sahitya:
paripAlanai puri pArvati maindA para deivamAna jnAna skandA


anupallavi

  guruvAm ararkkum upadEsham sheida kumarA en kula deivam nIyE emmaip-


caraNam    karuNAlaya nija bhakta janangaLin hrdayAlaya tAraka samhArA
taruNam kuramaghaL tazhuvum guhanE jaya SanmukhanE dayavAi vandemaip-
